title: Development of Social Education Materials Using Open Educational Resources (OER) Remix

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Utilization of VR simulations and mobile-friendly remix tools in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can understand and apply legal and technical procedures for OER remixing to actual educational scenarios.
Learners can remix and reorganize existing OER materials to create educational resources tailored for social studies subjects.
Learners can share remixed materials while complying with copyright licenses (e.g., CC BY-SA).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
